Class ProductService

java.lang.Object
com.fulda.webshop.service.ProductService
@Service public class ProductService extends Object
ProductService provides methods to manage products in the webshop. It interacts with the database through the ProductRepository to perform CRUD operations.

    • getAllProducts

      public List<Product> getAllProducts()
      Retrieves all products from the database.
      Returns:
      a list of all products available in the webshop

    • getProductById

      Retrieves a specific product by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the product to retrieve
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the found product or empty if not found

      Retrieves all products that match a specified color.
      Parameters:
      color - the color to filter products by
      Returns:
      a list of products that match the specified color

    • getAllProducts

      public org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Product> getAllProducts(org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Retrieves all products with pagination support.
      Parameters:
      pageable - pagination information including page number and size
      Returns:
      a Page containing products for the requested page and size

    • getProductsByName

      public org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Product> getProductsByName(String name, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Retrieves all products matching a specified name with pagination support.
      Parameters:
      name - the name to filter products by
      pageable - pagination information including page number and size
      Returns:
      a Page containing matching products for requested page and size
